text: The 2010 Israeli–Lebanese clash occurred on August 3, 2010. Israel Defence Forces and Lebanese Armed Forces fought along the border between Israel and Lebanon. Early reports said three Lebanese soldiers and a civilian were killed while five soldiers were wounded; reports also said one Israeli soldier was killedhttp://www.almanar.com.lb/newssite/NewsDetails.aspx?id=148884&language;=en and two were wounded. This was the most serious fighting on the border since the 2006 Lebanon War. == References == Category:2010 in Israel Category:21st century in Lebanon Category:Arab–Israeli conflict Category:August 2010 events
title: 2010 Israel–Lebanon border clash
